subject: p19800337
Findings: There is a small heterogeneous opacity in the right middle lobe which obscures the right cardiac border and can be seen posterior to the heart on lateral view. Otherwise, the lungs are clear. The hilar and cardiomediastinal contours are normal. There is no pneumothorax or pleural effusion. The pulmonary vascular markings are normal.
Impression: Early right middle lobe focal pneumonia. Findings were communicated to Dr. By Dr. By telephone on at 17:00.
